name: how to keep up with people
name_original: how to keep up with people
description:
how to keep up with people

a comprehensive guide to how to maintain a conversation, and therefore how to maintain a connection.

CONTROLS:

A/D keys or left/right arrow keys to move

space to begin/jump

escape to reset/quit

developers notes i think:

i made this game based on how difficult it is for me to keep conversation and stay in contact with people. i struggle with reaching out first, and i also get really nervous about what i'm saying the more i talkand respond. more often than not, the relationships i create are often destroyed by my own hand, simply because i fear the thought of interacting any further. hopefully this will act as a reminder for me to step out of my comfort zone and to, i dunno, have a semblance of a healthy social life/identity (and i guess an insight for everyone who plays lol)
